description: Retrieves the properties associated with a model-customization job, including the status of the job. For more information, see Custom models in the Amazon Bedrock User Guide.

nested_items.name: jobArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the customization job.

nested_items.name: jobName
nested_items.description: The name of the customization job.

nested_items.name: outputModelName
nested_items.description: The name of the output model.

nested_items.name: outputModelArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the output model.

nested_items.name: clientRequestToken
nested_items.description: The token that you specified in the CreateCustomizationJob request.

nested_items.name: roleArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the job. A successful job transitions from in-progress to completed when the output model is ready to use. If the job failed, the failure message contains information about why the job failed.

nested_items.name: failureMessage
nested_items.description: Information about why the job failed.

nested_items.name: statusDetails
nested_items.description: For a Distillation job, the details about the statuses of the sub-tasks of the customization job.

nested_items.name: validationDetails
nested_items.description: The status details for the validation sub-task of the job.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the validation sub-task of the job.

nested_items.name: creationTime
nested_items.description: The start time of the validation sub-task of the job.

nested_items.name: lastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: The latest update to the validation sub-task of the job.

nested_items.name: dataProcessingDetails
nested_items.description: The status details for the data processing sub-task of the job.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the data processing sub-task of the job.

nested_items.name: creationTime
nested_items.description: The start time of the data processing sub-task of the job.

nested_items.name: lastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: The latest update to the data processing sub-task of the job.

nested_items.name: trainingDetails
nested_items.description: The status details for the training sub-task of the job.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the training sub-task of the job.

nested_items.name: creationTime
nested_items.description: The start time of the training sub-task of the job.

nested_items.name: lastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: The latest update to the training sub-task of the job.

nested_items.name: creationTime
nested_items.description: Time that the resource was created.

nested_items.name: lastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: Time that the resource was last modified.

nested_items.name: endTime
nested_items.description: Time that the resource transitioned to terminal state.

nested_items.name: baseModelArn
nested_items.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the base model.

nested_items.name: hyperParameters
nested_items.description: The hyperparameter values for the job. For details on the format for different models, see Custom model hyperparameters.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: trainingDataConfig
nested_items.description: Contains information about the training dataset.

nested_items.name: s3Uri
nested_items.description: The S3 URI where the training data is stored.

nested_items.name: invocationLogsConfig
nested_items.description: Settings for using invocation logs to customize a model.

nested_items.name: usePromptResponse
nested_items.description: Whether to use the model's response for training, or just the prompt. The default value is False.

nested_items.name: invocationLogSource
nested_items.description: The source of the invocation logs.

nested_items.name: s3Uri
nested_items.description: The URI of an invocation log in a bucket.

nested_items.name: requestMetadataFilters
nested_items.description: Rules for filtering invocation logs based on request metadata.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: notEquals
nested_items.description: Include results where the key does not equal the value.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: andAll
nested_items.description: Include results where all of the based filters match.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: notEquals
nested_items.description: Include results where the key does not equal the value.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: orAll
nested_items.description: Include results where any of the base filters match.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: notEquals
nested_items.description: Include results where the key does not equal the value.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: validationDataConfig
nested_items.description: Contains information about the validation dataset.

nested_items.name: validators
nested_items.description: Information about the validators.

nested_items.name: s3Uri
nested_items.description: The S3 URI where the validation data is stored.

nested_items.name: outputDataConfig
nested_items.description: Output data configuration.

nested_items.name: s3Uri
nested_items.description: The S3 URI where the output data is stored.

nested_items.name: customizationType
nested_items.description: The type of model customization.

nested_items.name: outputModelKmsKeyArn
nested_items.description: The custom model is encrypted at rest using this key.

nested_items.name: trainingMetrics
nested_items.description: Contains training metrics from the job creation.

nested_items.name: trainingLoss
nested_items.description: Loss metric associated with the custom job.

nested_items.name: validationMetrics
nested_items.description: The loss metric for each validator that you provided in the createjob request.

nested_items.name: validationLoss
nested_items.description: The validation loss associated with this validator.

nested_items.name: vpcConfig
nested_items.description: VPC configuration for the custom model job.

nested_items.name: subnetIds
nested_items.description: An array of IDs for each subnet in the VPC to use.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: securityGroupIds
nested_items.description: An array of IDs for each security group in the VPC to use.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: customizationConfig
nested_items.description: The customization configuration for the model customization job.

nested_items.name: distillationConfig
nested_items.description: The Distillation configuration for the custom model.

nested_items.name: teacherModelConfig
nested_items.description: The teacher model configuration.

nested_items.name: teacherModelIdentifier
nested_items.description: The identifier of the teacher model.

nested_items.name: maxResponseLengthForInference
nested_items.description: The maximum number of tokens requested when the customization job invokes the teacher model.
